title: "Artificial intelligence could help narrow heart attack gender gap"
excerpt: "An algorithm developed using artificial intelligence could help doctors to diagnose heart attacks in women more accurately and quicker than ever before, according to research we fund and being presented at the European Society of Cardiology (ESC) Congress in Barcelona."
